p: In order to verify compounds with affinity for Hsp90, SPR was carried out which showed that some compounds ( 125, 168, 176, 211– 213, and 215) interacted with the protein. Nonetheless, three of them showed better affinity towards the chaperone ( 211 ( K D = 14 ± 5 nM; k a = 429 ± 8 (nM × s) −1; k d = 6 ± 1 (1/s) × 10 −3), 213 ( K D = 18 ± 6 nM; k a = 16 ± 3 (nM × s) −1; k d = 0.3 ± 0.1 (1/s) × 10 −3), and 215 ( K D = 15 ± 2 nM; k a = 467 ± 26 (nM × s) −1; k d = 7 ± 1 (1/s) × 10 −3)).
